creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: Loose line drawing of five figures; verso: architectral sketches
medium: Pen and brown ink over black chalk on paper
provenance: [Gian-Carlo Baroni, Florence, until 1982; sold, November, to Canedys]; Drs. Brenda and Norman Canedy, Minneapolis (since 1982-d. 2023)
title: Madonna and Child with the Young Saint John the Baptist, Saint Anthony Abbot, and Another Saint (recto); Architectural Studies (verso)
